timeline.message:
Use PackageID in all places

This is an attempt to use the PackageID class in all places instead of using separate entities such as orgname, module name and version.

replies.bodyText: This is created after decoding the org and name values. So I guess pkg.packageID and currentPkgId could be different
replies.author: riyafa
